website_summaries.verdict: If size is your main concern due to limited space, it's an acceptable option.
pros: Ideal if you don't have lots of space
cons: Cushions may sag and lose their shape over time
The backrest is short and not very supportive

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this in May 2016. It is now ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in May 2016. It is now nearly October 2017. The bottom cushions have proven to last just past any 1 year warranty period and now have almost no fluff left to them. They've become uncomfortable. When I bought this in 2016, it was $360. I would argue I got ripped off then and didn't know it. Now showing a price of $512 as of this writing, you'd be a fool to buy this couch. I, now stuck with mine, will be buying a 5" thick furniture foam sheet and refilling these myself...at a cost of about $130.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, don't buy this couch
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this purchase. I knew it was meant for smaller spaces, but it's a kids size couch. I'm 5'8", and cannot sit on the chaise comfortably, I'm too tall and my feet dangle off. Also, I've had the couch a month and a half, and it's already wearing and breaking down. The seat cushions have started to lose shape and have become concave where people are sitting. This couch seems meant for very little use. My recommendation is to spend a little more, this couch was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but it is a small/cheap/uncomfortable sofa
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but it is a small/cheap/uncomfortable sofa. It worked because we needed one quick and cheap, but I will definitely invest in another sofa soon. Very quick to assemble. The cushions often slide and get smashed from normal sitting. It is easy to keep clean, and it is nice that you can choose which end the long side is on.

This furniture combines a clean track or rolled arm design with tailored faux leather or plush microfiber upholstery. The Small Spaces sectional sofa will provide a comfortable place to sit for any room in your home. All models provide additional seating and allow you to choose the exact configuration for your needs. All models of the sectional sofa come with a chaise design that can be in the left or right position. It has a durable frame construction with loose seat and back cushions, as well as a no-sag sinuous spring foundation. Minimal assembly is required. For a comfortable seating solution in your home, turn to the Small Spaces Configurable Sectional Sofa in Multiple Colors.
